__e: Some psycho with an axe to grind had something to do with this gruesome end to a tarnished hero, and no one will keep me from bringing you the truth.
I find out some blade-swinging maniac is coming for you.
I got an ass with a phony badge trying to pull me over!
How's it feel to have a wacko for a son?
And why would he be a fool?
What does she see in a freak show like you anyway?
